description: A warm and robust pile fleece jacket for everyday outdoor life. Based on our best-selling Vardag Pile Fleece, the Vardag Pile Jacket comes with hardwearing G-1000 Eco reinforcements on the elbows, underside of forearms, chest, collar and pocket welts for extra durability in high-wear areas. Can be used as a jacket or as a mid layer under a shell jacket in colder climates.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Pile Jacket - Mens
